page.title: 16Post Office & Telephone Box
page.content: The Post Office is situated at the corner of Balvenie Street and Albert Place.It is run by Mrs A.Rettie.The hours of business are 0900_1300 and 1400_1730 on week days and 0900_1230 on Saturdays.There are 3 collection times on week days 10.15,12.15,and 17.15.There are 2 collections on Saturday one at 10.45 and 12.00.There is no collection on Sundays or New Year.There are 2 post boxes in Dufftown.1 at the top of Conval Street and the other at the corner of Stephen Avenue and Fife Street. There are 4 telephone boxes in Dufftown.2 are situated at the square beside the clock towerwhilst the others are at the top of Conval Street and at the corner of Stephen Avenue and MMount Crescent.
